item.description:
I am sorry to inform you that this event has been changed to a differant location due to no accomadations. We want the admission Fee to go to the Tisbert family We were not able to come to an agreement with Angelica's. Lets all join at the Princeton Station as Suzie always enjoyed her venues there! Sorry for the last minute change but this is for the family not us! We all love it there and is closer to home. Please make your change and join us (possibly Suzie, she's going to try to make it) she would love to see us all there!!


This would be greatly appreciated if we a could all get together for Susan's Family as they are in Much need of help for her family. As most of us know, Lauren is suffering and her health is failing but for the Grace of God a Miracle will happen for all of them! Lets all please take and make the time from our hearts to get together and enjoy a fun night out of celebrating the life God gives us and help Suzie's family As Suzie has done for many of us!

Lauren's condition at this point is still very weak, her heart has stopped twice two days ago. The wonderful Drs. took care of that and she is breathing on her own and heart is still going Praise God!
We need a Miracle at this point for her organs to regain strength and function on thier own



Eva will have a card to sign for those who will donate for her family...
We will have tables reserved with meetup signs on them/raffles....

This Event is Casual Please RSVP By 5PM on Saturday 9/11/10 for seating.

Looking forward to seeing you all there! :-0)

thank you so much eva, jill and nat, and all my wonderful meetup friends...here is the link to lauren tisbert's carepage at mass general hospital.
http://www.carepages....
hugs, susan

If you cannot attend this fundraiser please make out a check to:
Susan Tisbert
Mailing address
Eva Fiala
54 Rollins Street
Lawrence Ma 01841

Thank you all for making this a successful fundraiser.
item.how_to_find_us: we will have meetup signs on Reserved tables with Raffles and a box for cards/donations!

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Fundraiser for Suz Tisbert's Daughter Lauren/Last minute change on the venue..
